title: Jill Dunn and Carlene Higgins are Beauty First Responders
itunes:title: Jill Dunn and Carlene Higgins are Beauty First Responders
description:
Our guests this week have seen it all — and swatched it all! Jill Dunn and Carlene Higgins, hosts of Breaking Beauty, do the hard-hitting hair, makeup and skincare research so you don’t have to. They’re going beyond the hype to give us the truth behind TikTok’s trending products like the K18 hair mask and the Dyson AirWrap. Plus, we’ll hear why Jill is removing the “clean girl aesthetic” from her cart. We are taking allll the notes.

  • Jill’s JennyBird “The Brow” Sunglasses are bold yet incredibly versatile
  • She’s confident that the re-released Dyson AirWrap  is going to sell out fast this holiday season
  • She’s also vouching for the PillowtalkDerm skincare line, by Dr. Shereene Idriss 
  • Carlene was on the K18 leave-in hair mask kick way before TikTok
  • She calls the Chanel Noir Allure mascara the “limousine of mascaras"
  • Going out? What are you gonna wear? Definitely these Alix NYC bodysuits
  • Finished the episode? Don’t forget to add Breaking Beauty to cart!

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

To see all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. To purchase any of the products, see below. 

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 

Joining Lemonada Premium is a great way to support our show and get bonus content. Subscribe today at bit.ly/lemonadapremium.
